T02TD2911E:311a-0: @311a ` // rnam par 'joms pa ye shes sku //
T02TD2911E:311a-1: rab tu btud nas mdor bsdus bshad //
T02TD2911E:311a-3: khrus byas gos bgos mchod pa bsham //
T02TD2911E:311a-4: sbyan drangs la sogs sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD2911E:311a-5: tshad med bzhi po bsgom par bya //
T02TD2911E:311a-6: de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms te //
T02TD2911E:311a-7: rang sems zla bar h'um bsam bya //
T02TD2911E:311a-9: rdo rje rab dra ba dang //
T02TD2911E:311a-11: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar gyur /
T02TD2911E:311a-14: sngar bzhin sems can don byas te //
T02TD2911E:311a-15: slar yang rdo rje nyid la 'dus //
T02TD2911E:311a-16: rdo rje yongs gyur sku ru gsal //
T02TD2911E:311a-17: sku mdog mthing nag spyan gsum pa //
T02TD2911E:311a-18: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnon //
T02TD2911E:311a-19: phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab brda //
T02TD2911E:311a-20: zhabs gnyis stag gi pags pa bsnams //
T02TD2911E:311a-21: klu lngas lus brgyan me dpung 'bar //
T02TD2911E:311a-22: de ltar rnam par bsgoms nas kyang //
T02TD2911E:311a-23: ye shes khro bo spyan drangs te //
T02TD2911E:311a-24: mchod nas rang la gzhug par bya //
T02TD2911E:311a-25: nam mkhar sangs rgyas spyan drangs te //
T02TD2911E:311a-26: sprul pa'i lha mos dbang bskur ro//
T02TD2911E:311b-0: @311b spyi bor sna tshogs rdo rje bsam //
T02TD2911E:311b-1: spyan drangs lha rnams gshegs par gyur //
T02TD2911E:311b-2: de nas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis //
T02TD2911E:311b-3: spyi bo la sogs gnas gsum du //
T02TD2911E:311b-4: zla ba'i steng du yi ge gsum //
T02TD2911E:311b-5: yongs gyur mtshan ma gsum du gnas //
T02TD2911E:311b-6: de las bzlas pa byas pa ni //
T02TD2911E:311b-7: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas spyan drangs la //
T02TD2911E:311b-8: sngags dang 'od zer bcas pa las //
T02TD2911E:311b-9: phyag na rdo rje'i sku ru gsal //
T02TD2911E:311b-10: thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus dag na //
T02TD2911E:311b-11: bdag nyid khro bo chen por gnas //
T02TD2911E:311b-12: kun gyi thugs kar nyi steng du //
T02TD2911E:311b-13: rnam par 'joms pa'i yi ge dgod //
T02TD2911E:311b-14: phar spros don ni rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD2911E:311b-15: tshur 'dus sgrub pa nus par ldan //
T02TD2911E:311b-16: sngags kyi 'brug sgra lta bu ste //
T02TD2911E:311b-17: skyo na gtor ma gtang bar bya //
T02TD2911E:311b-18: mchod pa byas te ye shes gshegs //
T02TD2911E:311b-19: dam tshig nga rgyal kun spyod bya //
T02TD2911E:311b-20: 'dis ni sgrub pa mdor bsdus te //
T02TD2911E:311b-21: bsod nams mchog ni gang thob pa //
T02TD2911E:311b-22: bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis //
T02TD2911E:311b-23: rnam par 'joms pa thob par shog /'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad rdzogs so//
